AC5E.AutomateStatuses.Name: Automate D&D5E Statuses
AC5E.AutomateStatuses.Hint: When enabled, AC5E will automate dis/advantage and roll mode modifiers based on system statuses.

AC5E.ShowTooltipsHint: When a relevant option is selected, AC5e will show a helpful tooltip when hovering over the suggested Roll button or a generated message or both, summing up the reasons for that suggestion.
AC5E.ShowTooltipChatVisibility.Name: Show chat tooltips for
AC5E.ShowTooltipChatVisibility.Hint: 'All' - all actor rolls, 'None' - no rolls, 'Owned' - owned actors rolls, 'Players' -  player actors rolls; (the GM sees all)
AC5E.ExpandedConditionsHint: When enabled, AC5e will attempt to automate some extra conditions, like Dodging, Hiding.

AC5E.ActivityUse.Name: Item Use Checks
AC5E.ActivityUse.Hint: When the use of an item is not permitted, AC5e will 'Do nothing', just 'Warn' (notification) or 'Enforce' (roll cancellation + notification). The checked conditions are: incapacitated for relevant actions, and raging, silenced and not-proficient with armor when casting spells

Armor.Enforce: is not proficient in the equipped armor and RAW cannot cast spells. Spell cancelled!
Armor.Warn: is not proficient in the equipped armor and RAW cannot cast spells.

Incapacitated.Enforce: is incapacitated and cannot use any actions. Action cancelled!
Incapacitated.Warn: is incapacitated and cannot use any actions.

Raging.Enforce: is raging and cannot cast spells. Spell cancelled!
Raging.Warn: is raging and cannot cast spells.

Silenced.Enforce: is silenced and cannot cast spells with verbal components. Spell cancelled!
Silenced.Warn: is silenced and cannot cast spells with verbal components.

AC5E.AutoRangedAttacksHint: 'Off': AC5e will not process any distance checks; 'Ranged checks only': AC5e will automatically process distance disadvantage/fail based on target distance and range values of item used to attack; 'Range + Nearby foes': Hostiles adjacent to attacker will impose disadvantage on ranged attacks.
AC5E.AutoExhaustionHint: When enabled, and you are using the Legacy dnd5e rules, AC5e will automatically process the normal 5e Exhaustion condition rules.
AC5E.AutoEncumbranceHint: When enabled, AC5e will automatically process the variant 5e Encumbrance rules. The GM must also select in the settings of the Dnd5e system, the Variant (encumbered & heavily encumbered) option, otherwise this will have no effect.

AC5E.Targeting.Name: Targeting options for attacks
AC5E.Targeting.Hint: When no or multiple targets are selected for an Attack, choose how AC5e should respond

MultipleTargetsAttack.Source: AC5e: Multiple targets selected. Results may be skewed. Using source actor data only.
MultipleTargetsAttack.Enforce: AC5e: Multiple targets selected. Roll cancelled!

NoTargetsAttack.Source: AC5e: No targets selected. Advantage/disadvantage may be inaccurate. Using source actor data only.
NoTargetsAttack.Enforce: AC5e: No targets selected. Roll cancelled!

AC5E.DebuggingHint: Just some useful logs for debugging while developing. Probably makes little sense for users to have it on :)
AC5E.TokenlessActorWarning: AC5E warning: The actor you are rolling for, doesn't have a token on the scene. The results can be skewed

AC5E.EnvironmentalHazards.SettingsHint: Automate Burning and Suffocation conditions, based on the 2024 D&D 5e ruleset

flags.automated-condition-5e.crossbowExp.name: Crossbow Expert
flags.automated-condition-5e.crossbowExp.description: Being within 5 feet of an enemy doesn't impose Disadvantage on your attack rolls with crossbows

flags.automated-condition-5e.sharpShoote.name: Sharpshooter
flags.automated-condition-5e.sharpShoote.description: No disadvantage for firing ranged weapons at long range or within 5 feet of an enemy

flags.automated-condition-5e.spellSniper.name: Spell Sniper
flags.automated-condition-5e.spellSniper.description: For 2024 rules, no disadvantage for casting ranged spells within 5 feet of an enemy and if they have a range of at least 10ft, adds 60ft more

flags.automated-conditions-5e.attack.cri.name: Alter the criticalThreshold of the attacks
flags.automated-conditions-5e.attack.cri.description: Use threshold=-5 to reduce by 5 or set=15 to set the value to 15. You can use roll data, dice formulas and evaluate conditions too.

flags.automated-conditions-5e.grant.atta.name: Grant altered criticalThreshold to opponent's attacks
flags.automated-conditions-5e.grant.atta.description: Use threshold=-5 to reduce by 5 or set=15 to set the value to 15. You can use roll data, dice formulas and evaluate conditions too.

flags.automated-conditions-5e.aura.attac.name: An aura altering the criticalThreshold of the attacks in radius
flags.automated-conditions-5e.aura.attac.description: Use radius=15;threshold=-5 to reduce by 5 or radius=20;set=15 to set the value to 15. You can use roll data, dice formulas and evaluate conditions too.

flags.automated-conditions-5e.damage.ext.name: Increase or decrease the number of dice rolled for each denomination
flags.automated-conditions-5e.damage.ext.description: Use bonus=4 to increase the number of dice rolled by 4.

flags.automated-conditions-5e.grants.dam.name: Grant an increase or decrease to the number of dice rolled for each denomination
flags.automated-conditions-5e.grants.dam.description: Use bonus=-1 to decrease the number of dice rolled by 1

flags.automated-conditions-5e.aura.damag.name: An aura increasing or decreasing the number of dice rolled for each denomination
flags.automated-conditions-5e.aura.damag.description: Use bonus=2; radius=10 to increase the number of dice rolled for each denomination in a 10 distance units radius.

flags.automated-conditions-5e.modifyAC.name: Modify the AC of the actor against incoming attacks
flags.automated-conditions-5e.modifyAC.description: Use bonus=5 to add 5 to AC or set=15 to set the value to 15. You can use roll data, dice formulas and evaluate conditions too.

flags.automated-conditions-5e.grant.modi.name: Grant modified AC to the opponent of the attack
flags.automated-conditions-5e.grant.modi.description: Use bonus=-5 to subtract 5 from the AC or set=15 to set the value to 15. You can use roll data, dice formulas and evaluate conditions too.

flags.automated-conditions-5e.aura.modif.name: An aura modifying the AC of the relevant tokens in radius
flags.automated-conditions-5e.aura.modif.description: Use radius=10;bonus=1d4; or radius=15;set=15. The former will give a bonus to AC and the latter will set to the value provided

bonus.name: Roll gets bonus
bonus.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of: all/attack/check/concentration/damage/death/initiative/save/skill/tool. eg bonus=1d4 + 5 - rollingActor.abilities.dex.mod;

critical.name: Roll is critical (nat20 or crit damage)

modifier.name: min and max modifiers for d20 rolls modifiers for max and any for damage rolls
modifier.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of: attack/check/concentration/damage/death/initiative/save/skill/tool. eg modifier=(rollingActor.attributes.hp.pct < 50 ? max8 : min12)

modifyDC.name: Modify the DC of your actions. Will work for concentation checks and death saves you make too
modifyDC.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of: save/conc/death (check/skill/tool are supported but usually they don't have DC set). Use bonus=5 to add 5 to DC or set=15 to set it to the value provided. You can use roll data, dice formulas and evaluate conditions too.

noCritical.name: Suppress criticals
noCritical.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of all/attack/damage

advantage.name: Grant advantage to opponent's d20 rolls

bonus.name: Grant bonus to opponent's rolls
bonus.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of: all/attack/check/concentration/damage/death/initiative/save/skill/tool. Lead with the bonus= followed by a ; separator, eg bonus=1d4 + 5 - opponentActor.abilities.dex.mod;

critical.name: Grant critical (nat20 or damage) to opponent's rolls

disadvantage.name: Grant disadvantage to opponent's d20 rolls

modifier.name: Grant min and max modifiers for d20 rolls modifiers for max and any for damage rolls
modifier.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of: attack/check/concentration/damage/death/initiative/save/skill/tool. eg modifier=min10

modifyDC.name: Modify the DC of a roll you make against an action taken by another
modifyDC.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of: save/conc/death (check/skill/tool are supported but usually they don't have DC set). Use bonus=5 to add 5 to DC or set=15 to set it to the value provided. You can use roll data, dice formulas and evaluate conditions too.

noCritical.name: Grant no criticals
noCritical.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of all/attack/damage

fail.name: Grant failure to opponent's d20 rolls

fumble.name: Grant fumble (nat1) to opponent's d20 rolls

success.name: d20 rolls against or caused by you succeed

advantage.name: An aura giving advantage
advantage.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of: all/attack/check/concentration/damage/death/initiative/save/skill/tool. Change value format example for a save ACTIONTYPE and: radius=15;includeSelf;allies;str;cha; would give to all allies including self in 15ft radius advantage to strength or charisma saves.

bonus.name: An aura giving bonuses
bonus.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of: all/attack/check/concentration/damage/death/initiative/save/skill/tool. Change value format example for initiative ACTIONTYPE and effect value of: radius=20;bonus=-auraActor.abilities.cha.mod;opponentActor.statuses.surprised ALL within 20ft will have their rolls reduced by the source actor's cha mod if they are surprised

critical.name: An aura forcing critical (nat20 or damage)
critical.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of: all/attack/check/concentration/damage/death/initiative/save/skill/tool. Change value format: radius=Number;allies or enemies or omit for ALL;other conditions

disadvantage.name: An aura giving disadvantage
disadvantage.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of: all/attack/check/concentration/damage/death/initiative/save/skill/tool. Change value format: radius=Number;allies or enemies or omit for ALL;other conditions

modifier.name: An aura giving min and max modifiers for d20 rolls modifiers for max and any for damage rolls
modifier.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of: attack/check/concentration/damage/death/initiative/save/skill/tool. eg modifier=min10; radius=(rollingActor.details.level < 10 ? 15 : 30); modifier=min10

modifyDC.name: An aura that modifies the DC of actions the affected tokens take.
modifyDC.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of: save/conc/death (check/skill/tool are supported but usually they don't have DC set). Use bonus/set, radius as usual

noAdvantage.name: An aura that suppresses advantage mode
noAdvantage.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of all/attack/check/concentration/damage/death/initiative/save/skill/tool. Use radius as usual

noCritical.name: An aura that suppresses criticals
noCritical.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of all/attack/damage. Use radius as usual

noDisadvantage.name: An aura that suppresses disadvantage mode
noDisadvantage.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of all/attack/check/concentration/damage/death/initiative/save/skill/tool. Use radius as usual

fail.name: An aura forcing d20 rolls to fail
fail.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of: all/attack/check/concentration/death/save/skill/tool. Change value format: radius=Number;allies or enemies or omit for ALL;other conditions

fumble.name: An aura forcing d20 rolls to fumble
fumble.description: An aura around the actor that has the effect on. Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of: all/attack/check/concentration/death/initiative/save/skill/tool. Change value format: radius=Number;allies or enemies or omit for ALL;other conditions

success.name: An aura forcing success
success.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of: all/attack/check/concentration//death/save/skill/tool. Change value format: radius=Number;allies or enemies or omit for ALL;other conditions
